entry.title: Amazonia signed and passed the Supplementary Convention on the Abolition of Slavery.
entry.content: President VÃ¢n Tinh NghiÃªn Tuyáº¿t signed the Supplementary Convention on the Abolition of Slavery on 15 August. The following are the signed documents:
